remarks.para: FWD and/or AFT light(s) may be inoperative provided associated trim air modulation valve(s) remains closed.

note.para: If flight deck (or affected compartment) temperature becomes too hot or too cold, select trim air OFF to achieve 75°F control.

placard.para: Placard respective Cabin Temp Selector "DO-NOT-OPERATE" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: To close trim air modulation valve, accomplish Dispatch Maintenance Procedure 21-61-1-2.
